text: (he nabee!) aap kahen ki kya tumane isapar bhee vichaar kiya ki yadi allaah tumhaare sunane tatha dekhane kee shakti chheen le aur tumhaare dilon par muhar laga de, to allaah ke siva kaun hai, jo tumhen ise vaapas dila sake? dekho, ham kaise baar-baar aayaten[1] prastut kar rahe hain, phir bhee ve munh[2] pher rahe hain
